item.title: 4 AI based apps that don't suck
item.description: Youper Youper is an app for people who want to talk about their mental health problems. Pros Excellent UI/UX design. When you first install the app, it tells you that you need to evaluate your mental health by speaking to a mental health professional.Â After evaluating your mental health, you can have a conversation a virtual AI that helps you to talk about your problems. This way you can always talk about your problems whether someone is available or not.
